"Welcome back, Clarissa.": "You brought them like I asked. Someone for me to play with."
"Like he asked... Clarissa?! Were you...?"
"...Correct. I have already died."
"The Clarissa you see before you was created by Flo. It moves in accordance with his will."
"Flo desired a friend, and I was to bring him one. Such was my purpose."
"So it was all a trick?"
"Were you lying when you asked us to save him?"
"Heeeey, don't just ignore me! Go away already, Clarissa!"
"Clarissa?! What did you do to her!"
"Hm? You wanna see Clarissa? I can make as many as you want. Watch."
"See?"
"And not just Clarissa. I've got all kinds of friends!"
"See? Isn't it amazing? I can keep on making friends to play with for forever!"
"Is this replication magic...? Or cloning...? No, it's way beyond that."
"Could he be using the information stored in the Akashic Record to do this?!"
"...'Kay, let's play! Everyone else broke too quickly and it was really boring!"
"So I asked Clarissa to go out and find me a toy that wouldn't!"
"Now I have you... So let's play lots and lots!"
"Come on and play! With both of us! We'll have so much fun together!"
